trans-unit.note: Currently selected slide number read by screen reader

trans-unit.source: Shirokuro.club is a nonprofit club that our purpose is to make activities of manga, anime, Japanese culture, Weiß Schwarz, board games and video games.
Formally created on by a set of people that was playing Weiß Schwarz. But our activities started many years ago.

Shirokuro name is a bad pun. "Weiß Schwarz" are two german words that his translation is "White Black". Due that "Weiß Schwarz" is a japanese game we choice a japanese name: Shiro(白) kuro (黒) that also his translation is "White Black".
We currently have the following social networks:
To join us you must send a presentation letter to the email that appears in the contact section.
Shirokuro.club periodically organizes different meetings to play board games at Espai Jove Casa Sagnier.
In our private channel we create different groups and games to play in the next meeting. Each meet we choose different boardgames types.
We have held activities for the following events:
We are currently looking for entities to hold new events. One of the ideas that we are considering is the realization of an event for charitable collection.
Japan Weekend is the largest pop culture event in Spain.
Akihabara@Deep is an interassociative project for the creation of the first free multiplex lounge for alternative leisure and oriental culture.
La Fontana by Night is the festival of dispersed culture and alternative leisure of the Barcelona Youth Council (CJB) and Espai Jove La Fontana.
On the Big Day you can spend a day playing board games with classic games and other more modern ones in Espai Jove Casa Sagnier.
Do you like board games? This is your community!
We participate in multiple events throughout the year. If you want us to participate in an event, contact us!
Do you like video games? Are you from the community and you like to play with friends? Contact us. You probably will find someone willing to play or talk.
Do you like Manga and Anime? This is your board game! It is based on combat from various anime and video games today.
Alternative culture and leisure club in Barcelona.
Our purpose is to make activities of manga, anime, Japanese culture, Weiß Schwarz, board games and video games.
Shirokuro.club organizes differents video games activities to have fun.
We carry out totally free demonstrations. Depending on availability, a demo deck will be given away to new players.
We carry out official tournaments totally free. This includes the official material that Bushiroad provides.
Weiβ Schwarz is the most popular trading card game in Japan! Dozens of anime and video game worlds come together for epic crossover duels with all your favorite characters!
With the cute character of the Weiβ (White) side and the action-adventure characters of the Schwarz (Black) side, you can build your dream team!
Replay famous scenes and create new ones limited only by your imagination! Call your favorite characters to your own personal stage, in Weiβ Schwarz!
Shirokuro.club offers different Weiβ Schwarz activities:
Shirokuro.club carries out free activities for events in the Barcelona metropolitan area.
Let us meet you. Participate in our activities. Club with totally healthy environment. We have 0 tolerance with toxic people.
Do you want to participate in our activities? Check the calendar for next activities. You can get more information of all our activities in home.
To participate in any activity is required to contact us.
We carry out totally free demonstrations. Depending on availability, a demo deck will be given away to new players.
